Package main.trees

Class BinaryNode<T>

java.lang.Object
main.trees.BinaryNode<T>
class BinaryNode<T> extends Object
A class that represents nodes in a binary tree.
Version:
5.0
Author:
Frank M. Carrano, Timothy M. Henry
